title: David Armstrong
description: In this special podcast to celebrate the 40th Anniversary of SHI, Gillian Bendelow interviews David Armstrong, author of the article ‘The Rise of Surveillance Medicine’ published in Volume 17, Issue 3 of SHI.
itunes:author: Wiley
itunes:subtitle: In this special podcast to celebrate the 40th Anniversary of SHI, Gillian Bendelow interviews David Armstrong, author of the article ‘The Rise of Surveillance Medicine’ published in Volume 17, Issue 3 of SHI.
